duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for receiving, warehousing, and coordinating the distribution of products.
Handling and storage of spare assets
Ensuring accurate accounting of all transactions in the Enterprise Resource Planning System (Oracle)
Operating various material handling equipment including hand trucks, power tools, shrink wrap, and banding/strapping equipment

education_certification.credential: Minimum one year of experience in logistics support operations preferred
Ability to read and comprehend technical drawings/instructions, as well as a variety of company and federal regulations
